attributes.action: Our Wildlife Deserves Better. Slow Down, Save the lives of our precious wildlife
attributes.additional_details: in high-risk areas. Simple measures like these can remind drivers to slow down and stay alert, saving countless lives. Our countryside is home to precious creatures who deserve our care and protection. Let’s make our roads safer for wildlife and preserve the natural beauty of Brentwood and Doddinghurst. Harold hill deer aid has been amazing every time I have seen an animal that is injured, something needs to be done!
attributes.background: Too many of our beautiful wild animals—especially deer—are being injured or killed on our country roads each year. These heartbreaking losses can be prevented. We call on Brentwood Borough Council and Essex County Council to take action by putting more wildlife warning signs and clear road markings
